head.title: About me

body:
Rafatdin Shimbergenov
BSc (Hons) in Business Information Systems at Westminster International University in Tashkent.
Currently working as a software engineer at LG CNS.

I'm a simple guy, and an enthusiastic software developer, keen to grab the new knowledge and trying to share the things interesting to me:
books, movies, and hacking away at everything from compilers, Unity3D and C# projects to node.js while listening some goood music.

The website is powered by Phenomic and React, hosted on GitHub Pages.
